data.title: Famous Weddings & Divorces in 2002
data.meta_description: Famous weddings and divorces in 2002. See which famous celebrities and historical figures married and divorced in 2002.
data.text:
Famous Weddings

Eric Clapton

British guitar legend Eric Clapton (56) weds Melia McEnery (25) at St. Mary Magdalen Church in Surrey, London

Former Atomic Kitten member Kerry Katona (21) weds "Westlife" member Brian McFadden (21) at the Church of the Immaculate Conception in Rathfeigh, County Meath, Republic of Ireland

Conan O'Brien

TV Host Conan O'Brien (38) weds Liza Powel (31) at St. James Cathedral in Seattle, Washington

Willem-Alexander

Crown Prince Willem-Alexander of the Netherlands (34) weds Argentinean born Máxima Zorreguieta Cerruti (30) at the Beurs van Berlage in Amsterdam, Netherlands

Joan Collins

Actress Joan Collins (68) weds theater company manager Percy Gibson at Claridge's Hotel in London

LeAnn Rimes

"Blue" country and pop singer LeAnn Rimes (19) weds backup dancer Dean Sheremet (21) at Perkins Chapel in Dallas, Texas

Liza Minnelli

Oscar-winning entertainer Liza Minnelli (56) weds (her 4th) American concert promoter David Gest (48) at the Marble Collegiate Church in New York City; separate in 2003, divorce in 2007

King Mohammed VI of Morocco (38) weds information services engineer Salma Bennani (23) in Rabat, Morocco

"Law & Order" actor Benjamin Bratt (38) weds actress-model Talisa Soto (35) in San Francisco, California

Mark McGwire

MLB player Mark McGwire (38) weds Stephanie Slemer (26) in Las Vegas, Nevada

Carl Yastrzemski

Retired MLB outfielder Carl Yastrzemski (62) weds Nancy Benson

Princess Martha Louise of Norway (30) weds author Ari Behn (29) in Trondheim, Norway; divorce in 2017

Claudia Schiffer

German supermodel Claudia Schiffer (31) weds British film director Matthew Vaughn (31) in Suffolk, England

American "NYPD Blue" actress Sharon Lawrence (30) weds American doctor Thomas Apostle at Saint Sophia Cathedral in Los Angeles

Former "Survivor" contestant and talk show host Elisabeth Filarski (25) weds former Boston College quarterback Tim Hasselbeck (24) at St. Mary

American teen rock star Taylor Hanson (19) weds Natalie Bryant (18) at Callaway Gardens in Pine Mountain, Georgia

Björn Borg

Swedish five-time Wimbledon champion Björn Borg (46) weds real estate broker Patricia Ostfeldt (35) near Stockholm

Peter Gabriel

"In Your Eyes" singer Peter Gabriel (51) weds Meah Flynn at Li Capanni Hotel in Italy

Soviet-Russian 1988 and 1994 Olympic Champion skater Ekaterina Gordeeva (31) weds 1998 Olympic Champion figure skater Ilia Kulik (25) in San Francisco

Paul McCartney & Heather Mills

British musician Paul McCartney (59) weds former English model and anti-landmines campaigner Heather Mills (34) at Castle Leslie in County Monaghan, Ireland; divorce in 2008

"American Pie" actress Shannon Elizabeth (28) weds actor Joe Reitman (34) in Jalisco, Mexico

Charlie Sheen

Actor Charlie Sheen (36) weds actress Denise Richards (31) under a rose arch dotted by over 1000 blooms in Brentwood, California

"Tuck Everlasting" actor Jonathan Jackson (20) weds "General Hospital" actress Lisa Vultaggio (29)

Actor-comedian Tom Arnold (43) weds Shelby Roos (29) at the Four Seasons Hotel in Beverly Hills

Julia Roberts

American Oscar-winning actress Julia Roberts (34) weds American movie cameraman Danny Moder (33) at her 82-acre ranch in Taos, New Mexico

"Smallville" actor Tom Welling (25) weds model Jamie White in Martha's Vineyard, Massachusetts

ABC's World News Tonight co-host Elizabeth Vargas (39) weds singer-songwriter Marc Cohn (43) at the Council on Foreign Relations

American "Baywatch" actress Angelica Bridges (28) weds Canadian hockey player Sheldon Souray (26) at the Bellagio Hotel in Las Vegas, Nevada; divorce in 2007

Lisa Marie Presley & Nicolas Cage

American Academy Award-winning actor Nicolas Cage (38) weds "Princess of Rock and Roll" Lisa Marie Presley (34) at the Mauna Lani Bay Hotel on the Big Island of Hawaii; divorce in 2004

American television journalist Bryant Gumbel (53) weds second wife, model Hilary Quinlan (42) at Breakers Hotel in Palm Beach, Florida

American "Baywatch" actress Yasmine Bleeth (34) weds American strip club owner Paul Cerrito (32) at Bacara Resort and Spa in Santa Barbara, California

"Star Trek: Deep Space Nine" actress Terry Farrell (38) weds actor Brian Baker (35) at Paris Las Vegas in Paradise, Nevada

Sarah Michelle Gellar

Actress Sarah Michelle Gellar (35) weds actor Freddie Prinze Jr. (36) at El Careyes Resort in Mexico

Gwen Stefani

American "No Doubt" singer Gwen Stefani (42) weds British "Bush" singer and guitarist Gavin Rossdale (46) at St. Paul's Church in London, England; divorce in 2016

Laurence Fishburne

"The Matrix" actor Laurence Fishburne (41) weds actress Gina Torres (33) at The Cloisters museum in New York City

Micky Dolenz

"The Monkees" lead vocalist Micky Dolenz (57) weds Donna Quinter in Calabasas, California

"Angel" actress Charisma Carpenter (32) weds Damian Hardy

Jessica Simpson

American singer-songwriter and TV personality Jessica Simpson (22) weds singer-songwriter Nick Lachey (28) at Riverbend Church in Austin, Texas

Eighties pop princess Sheena Easton (43) weds Beverly Hills plastic surgeon John Minoli (44) at Las Vegas City Hall

Shaquille O'Neal

Los Angeles Lakers center Shaquille O'Neal (30) weds Shaunie Nelson at The Beverly Hills Hotel's Crystal Garden

Actress Rachel Griffiths (34) weds Australian artist Andrew Taylor (35) at Star of the Sea Chapel in Gardenvale, Australia

Famous Divorces

Edward James Olmos

"12 Angry Men" actor Edward James Olmos (55) divorces "Sopranos" actress Lorraine Bracco (47) after 8 years of marriage

Drew Barrymore

Comedian Tom Green (30) divorces actress Drew Barrymore (26) due to irreconcilable differences after less than a year of marriage

Nicolas Cage & Lisa Marie Presley

Academy Award-winning actor Nicolas Cage (38) files for divorce from the "Princess of Rock and Roll" Lisa Marie Presley (34) due to irreconcilable differences after 3 months of marriage
